data.name: Concussive Blast
data.description: Pharah looses a wrist rocket that knocks back any enemies it strikes.

hero.name: Pharah
hero.description: Soaring through the air in her combat armor, and armed with a launcher that lays down high-explosive rockets, Pharah is a force to be reckoned with.

data.name: Jump Jet
data.description: Propelled by her suit’s thrusters, Pharah soars high into the air.

hero.name: Pharah
hero.description: Soaring through the air in her combat armor, and armed with a launcher that lays down high-explosive rockets, Pharah is a force to be reckoned with.

data.name: Hover Jets
data.description: Pharah hovers in mid-air.

hero.name: Pharah
hero.description: Soaring through the air in her combat armor, and armed with a launcher that lays down high-explosive rockets, Pharah is a force to be reckoned with.

data.name: Barrage
data.description: Pharah directs a continuous salvo of mini-rockets to destroy groups of enemies.

hero.name: Pharah
hero.description: Soaring through the air in her combat armor, and armed with a launcher that lays down high-explosive rockets, Pharah is a force to be reckoned with.

data.name: Hellfire Shotguns
data.description: Reaper tears enemies apart with twin shotguns.

hero.name: Reaper
hero.description: Hellfire Shotguns, the ghostly ability to become immune to damage, and the power to step between shadows make Reaper one of the deadliest beings on Earth.
hero.base_of_operations: Los Angeles, California, United States of America

data.name: Wraith Form
data.description: Reaper becomes a shadow for a short period of time. While in this form, he takes no damage and is able to pass through enemies, but cannot fire his weapons or use other abilities.

hero.name: Reaper
hero.description: Hellfire Shotguns, the ghostly ability to become immune to damage, and the power to step between shadows make Reaper one of the deadliest beings on Earth.
hero.base_of_operations: Los Angeles, California, United States of America

data.name: Shadow Step
data.description: After marking a destination, Reaper disappears and reappears at that location.

hero.name: Reaper
hero.description: Hellfire Shotguns, the ghostly ability to become immune to damage, and the power to step between shadows make Reaper one of the deadliest beings on Earth.
hero.base_of_operations: Los Angeles, California, United States of America

data.name: The Reaping
data.description: Reaper collects souls from fallen enemies to replenish his health.

hero.name: Reaper
hero.description: Hellfire Shotguns, the ghostly ability to become immune to damage, and the power to step between shadows make Reaper one of the deadliest beings on Earth.
hero.base_of_operations: Los Angeles, California, United States of America

data.name: Death Blossom
data.description: In a blur of motion, Reaper empties both hellfire shotguns at breakneck speed, dealing massive damage to all nearby enemies.

hero.name: Reaper
hero.description: Hellfire Shotguns, the ghostly ability to become immune to damage, and the power to step between shadows make Reaper one of the deadliest beings on Earth.
hero.base_of_operations: Los Angeles, California, United States of America

data.name: Rocket Hammer
data.description: Reinhardt’s Rocket Hammer is an exemplary melee weapon, able to deal punishing damage in a wide arc with every swing.

hero.name: Reinhardt
hero.description: Clad in powered armor and swinging his hammer, Reinhardt leads a rocket-propelled charge across the battleground and defends his squadmates with a massive energy barrier.

data.name: Barrier Field
data.description: Reinhardt projects a broad, forward-facing energy barrier, which can absorb substantial damage before it is destroyed. Although Reinhardt can protect himself and his companions behind the barrier, he cannot attack while sustaining it.

hero.name: Reinhardt
hero.description: Clad in powered armor and swinging his hammer, Reinhardt leads a rocket-propelled charge across the battleground and defends his squadmates with a massive energy barrier.

data.name: Charge
data.description: Reinhardt charges forth in a straight line, pinning the first enemy in his path and knocking others aside. If he collides with a wall, the foe he’s carrying suffers extreme damage.

hero.name: Reinhardt
hero.description: Clad in powered armor and swinging his hammer, Reinhardt leads a rocket-propelled charge across the battleground and defends his squadmates with a massive energy barrier.

data.name: Fire Strike
data.description: By whipping his Rocket Hammer forward, Reinhardt slings a flaming projectile which pierces and damages any enemies it touches.

hero.name: Reinhardt
hero.description: Clad in powered armor and swinging his hammer, Reinhardt leads a rocket-propelled charge across the battleground and defends his squadmates with a massive energy barrier.

data.name: Earthshatter
data.description: Reinhardt forcefully slams his rocket hammer into the ground, knocking down and damaging all enemies in front of him.

hero.name: Reinhardt
hero.description: Clad in powered armor and swinging his hammer, Reinhardt leads a rocket-propelled charge across the battleground and defends his squadmates with a massive energy barrier.

data.name: Scrap Gun
data.description: Roadhog's Scrap Gun fires short-range blasts of shrapnel with a wide spread. Alternatively, it can launch a shrapnel ball that detonates farther away, scattering metal fragments from the point of impact.

hero.name: Roadhog
hero.description: Roadhog uses his signature Chain Hook to pull his enemies close before shredding them with blasts from his Scrap Gun. He’s hardy enough to withstand tremendous damage, and can recover his health with a short breather.

data.name: Take A Breather
data.description: Roadhog restores a chunk of his health over a brief period of time.

hero.name: Roadhog
hero.description: Roadhog uses his signature Chain Hook to pull his enemies close before shredding them with blasts from his Scrap Gun. He’s hardy enough to withstand tremendous damage, and can recover his health with a short breather.

data.name: Chain Hook
data.description: Roadhog hurls his chain at a target; if it catches, he yanks them into close range.

hero.name: Roadhog
hero.description: Roadhog uses his signature Chain Hook to pull his enemies close before shredding them with blasts from his Scrap Gun. He’s hardy enough to withstand tremendous damage, and can recover his health with a short breather.

data.name: Whole Hog
data.description: After cramming a top-loader onto his Scrap Gun, Roadhog pours in ammo. For a short time, he can crank out a stream of shrapnel that knocks back enemies.

hero.name: Roadhog
hero.description: Roadhog uses his signature Chain Hook to pull his enemies close before shredding them with blasts from his Scrap Gun. He’s hardy enough to withstand tremendous damage, and can recover his health with a short breather.

data.name: Heavy Pulse Rifle
data.description: Soldier: 76’s rifle remains particularly steady while unloading fully-automatic pulse fire. He can also fire single shots with pinpoint accuracy.

hero.name: Soldier: 76
hero.description: Armed with cutting-edge weaponry, including an experimental pulse rifle that’s capable of firing spirals of high-powered Helix Rockets, Soldier: 76 has the speed and support know-how of a highly trained warrior.

data.name: Helix Rockets
data.description: Tiny rockets spiral out of Soldier: 76’s Pulse Rifle in a single burst. The rockets’ explosion damages enemies in a small radius.

hero.name: Soldier: 76
hero.description: Armed with cutting-edge weaponry, including an experimental pulse rifle that’s capable of firing spirals of high-powered Helix Rockets, Soldier: 76 has the speed and support know-how of a highly trained warrior.

data.name: Sprint
data.description: Whether he needs to evade a firefight or get back into one, Soldier: 76 can rush ahead in a burst of speed. His sprint ends if he takes an action other than charging forward.

hero.name: Soldier: 76
hero.description: Armed with cutting-edge weaponry, including an experimental pulse rifle that’s capable of firing spirals of high-powered Helix Rockets, Soldier: 76 has the speed and support know-how of a highly trained warrior.

data.name: Biotic Field
data.description: Soldier: 76 plants a biotic emitter on the ground. Its energy projection restores health to 76 and any of his squadmates within the field.

hero.name: Soldier: 76
hero.description: Armed with cutting-edge weaponry, including an experimental pulse rifle that’s capable of firing spirals of high-powered Helix Rockets, Soldier: 76 has the speed and support know-how of a highly trained warrior.

data.name: Tactical Visor
data.description: Soldier: 76’s pinpoint targeting visor “locks” his aim on the threat closest to his crosshairs. If an enemy leaves his line of sight, Soldier: 76 can quickly switch to another target.

hero.name: Soldier: 76
hero.description: Armed with cutting-edge weaponry, including an experimental pulse rifle that’s capable of firing spirals of high-powered Helix Rockets, Soldier: 76 has the speed and support know-how of a highly trained warrior.

data.name: Photon Projector
data.description: Symmetra’s weapon emits a short-range beam that homes in on a nearby enemy, dealing continuous damage that increases the longer it is connected. The projector can also release a charged energy ball that deals high damage.

hero.name: Symmetra
hero.description: Symmetra utilizes her light-bending Photon Projector to dispatch adversaries, shield her associates, construct teleportation pads and deploy particle-blasting Sentry Turrets.

data.name: Sentry Turret
data.description: Symmetra sets up a small turret that automatically fires speed-reducing blasts at the nearest enemy within range. Several turrets can be built on the battlefield at once.

hero.name: Symmetra
hero.description: Symmetra utilizes her light-bending Photon Projector to dispatch adversaries, shield her associates, construct teleportation pads and deploy particle-blasting Sentry Turrets.

data.name: Photon Shield
data.description: Symmetra surrounds an ally with a hard-light shield that absorbs damage and persists as long as that ally remains alive.

hero.name: Symmetra
hero.description: Symmetra utilizes her light-bending Photon Projector to dispatch adversaries, shield her associates, construct teleportation pads and deploy particle-blasting Sentry Turrets.

data.name: Teleporter
data.description: Symmetra places a teleporter exit pad at her current location, and connects it to a teleporter entry pad at her team’s starting point. Allies can travel through the entry pad to the exit pad instantly, enabling them to return to the fight swiftly after being defeated.

hero.name: Symmetra
hero.description: Symmetra utilizes her light-bending Photon Projector to dispatch adversaries, shield her associates, construct teleportation pads and deploy particle-blasting Sentry Turrets.

data.name: Rivet Gun
data.description: Torbjörn fires rivets at long range, or ejects molten metal from his gun in a short, close-range burst.

hero.name: Torbjörn
hero.description: Torbjörn’s extensive arsenal includes a rivet gun and hammer, as well as a personal forge that he can use to build upgradeable turrets and dole out protective armor packs.

data.name: Forge Hammer
data.description: Torbjörn uses his multipurpose hammer to build, upgrade and repair turrets. In a pinch, it can also be swung as a weapon.

hero.name: Torbjörn
hero.description: Torbjörn’s extensive arsenal includes a rivet gun and hammer, as well as a personal forge that he can use to build upgradeable turrets and dole out protective armor packs.

data.name: Build Turret
data.description: Torbjörn constructs an enemy-tracking autocannon. He can use his Forge Hammer to repair or upgrade it, increasing its health and adding a second cannon barrel and a rocket launcher.

hero.name: Torbjörn
hero.description: Torbjörn’s extensive arsenal includes a rivet gun and hammer, as well as a personal forge that he can use to build upgradeable turrets and dole out protective armor packs.

data.name: Scrap Collector
data.description: Collect scrap to gain resources.

hero.name: Torbjörn
hero.description: Torbjörn’s extensive arsenal includes a rivet gun and hammer, as well as a personal forge that he can use to build upgradeable turrets and dole out protective armor packs.

data.name: Armor Pack
data.description: Torbjörn deploys an armor upgrade; either he or his allies can pick it up to absorb some damage.

hero.name: Torbjörn
hero.description: Torbjörn’s extensive arsenal includes a rivet gun and hammer, as well as a personal forge that he can use to build upgradeable turrets and dole out protective armor packs.

data.name: Molten Core
data.description: After overheating his personal forge, Torbjörn gains a significant amount of armor. He also attacks (and builds and repairs turrets) far faster than normal.

hero.name: Torbjörn
hero.description: Torbjörn’s extensive arsenal includes a rivet gun and hammer, as well as a personal forge that he can use to build upgradeable turrets and dole out protective armor packs.

data.name: Pulse Pistols
data.description: Tracer rapid-fires both of her pistols.

hero.name: Tracer
hero.description: Toting twin pulse pistols, energy-based time bombs, and rapid-fire banter, Tracer is able to \blink\" through space and rewind her personal timeline as she battles to right wrongs the world over."""

data.name: Blink
data.description: Tracer zips horizontally through space in the direction she’s moving, and reappears several yards away. She stores up to three charges of the blink ability and generates more every few seconds.

hero.name: Tracer
hero.description: Toting twin pulse pistols, energy-based time bombs, and rapid-fire banter, Tracer is able to \blink\" through space and rewind her personal timeline as she battles to right wrongs the world over."""

data.name: Recall
data.description: Tracer bounds backward in time, returning her health, ammo and position on the map to precisely where they were a few seconds before.

hero.name: Tracer
hero.description: Toting twin pulse pistols, energy-based time bombs, and rapid-fire banter, Tracer is able to \blink\" through space and rewind her personal timeline as she battles to right wrongs the world over."""

data.name: Pulse Bomb
data.description: Tracer lobs a large bomb that adheres to any surface or unfortunate opponent it lands on. After a brief delay, the bomb explodes, dealing high damage to all enemies within its blast radius.

hero.name: Tracer
hero.description: Toting twin pulse pistols, energy-based time bombs, and rapid-fire banter, Tracer is able to \blink\" through space and rewind her personal timeline as she battles to right wrongs the world over."""

data.name: Widow's Kiss
data.description: Widowmaker’s versatile sniper rifle is ideal for scope-aimed shots at distant targets. Should targets close to medium range, the rifle can also be fired in fully-automatic mode.

hero.name: Widowmaker
hero.description: Widowmaker equips herself with whatever it takes to eliminate her targets, including mines that dispense poisonous gas, a visor that grants her squad infra-sight, and a powerful sniper rifle that can fire in fully-automatic mode.

data.name: Grappling Hook
data.description: Widowmaker launches a grappling hook towards the location she’s aiming at – when the hook connects with a scalable surface, she’s quickly drawn towards it, allowing her to expand her view of the battlefield and evade or flank targets.

hero.name: Widowmaker
hero.description: Widowmaker equips herself with whatever it takes to eliminate her targets, including mines that dispense poisonous gas, a visor that grants her squad infra-sight, and a powerful sniper rifle that can fire in fully-automatic mode.

data.name: Venom Mine
data.description: Widowmaker adheres a swiftly-arming venom mine to nearly any surface. When a target wanders within range of the mine’s motion trigger, it explodes, delivering poison gas to any enemies in the vicinity.

hero.name: Widowmaker
hero.description: Widowmaker equips herself with whatever it takes to eliminate her targets, including mines that dispense poisonous gas, a visor that grants her squad infra-sight, and a powerful sniper rifle that can fire in fully-automatic mode.

data.name: Infra-Sight
data.description: Widowmaker’s recon visor allows her to see the heat signatures of her targets through walls and objects for a moderate amount of time. This enhanced vision is shared with her allies.

hero.name: Widowmaker
hero.description: Widowmaker equips herself with whatever it takes to eliminate her targets, including mines that dispense poisonous gas, a visor that grants her squad infra-sight, and a powerful sniper rifle that can fire in fully-automatic mode.

data.name: Tesla Cannon
data.description: Winston’s weapon fires a short-range electric barrage for as long as he holds down the trigger.

hero.name: Winston
hero.description: Winston wields impressive inventions—a jump pack, electricity-blasting Tesla Cannon, portable shield projector and more—with literal gorilla strength.

data.name: Jump Pack
data.description: Assisted by his energy pack, Winston lunges through the air, dealing significant damage and staggering nearby enemies when he lands.

hero.name: Winston
hero.description: Winston wields impressive inventions—a jump pack, electricity-blasting Tesla Cannon, portable shield projector and more—with literal gorilla strength.

data.name: Barrier Projector
data.description: Winston's barrier projector extends a bubble-shaped field that absorbs damage until it's destroyed. Allies protected by the barrier can return fire from within it.

hero.name: Winston
hero.description: Winston wields impressive inventions—a jump pack, electricity-blasting Tesla Cannon, portable shield projector and more—with literal gorilla strength.

data.name: Primal Rage
data.description: Winston embraces his animal nature, significantly boosting his health and making him very difficult to kill, strengthening his melee attack, and allowing him to use his Jump Pack ability more frequently. While raging, Winston can only make melee and Jump Pack attacks.

hero.name: Winston
hero.description: Winston wields impressive inventions—a jump pack, electricity-blasting Tesla Cannon, portable shield projector and more—with literal gorilla strength.

data.name: Particle Cannon
data.description: Zarya’s mighty Particle Cannon unleashes a short-range beam of destructive energy. Alternatively, Zarya can lob an explosive charge to strike multiple opponents.

hero.name: Zarya
hero.description: Deploying powerful personal barriers that convert incoming damage into energy for her massive Particle Cannon, Zarya is an invaluable asset on the front lines of any battle.

data.name: Particle Barrier
data.description: The Particle Cannon can emit a personal barrier that shields Zarya against incoming attacks, redirecting their energy to enhance her weapon’s damage and the width of its beam.

hero.name: Zarya
hero.description: Deploying powerful personal barriers that convert incoming damage into energy for her massive Particle Cannon, Zarya is an invaluable asset on the front lines of any battle.

data.name: Projected Barrier
data.description: Zarya surrounds one of her teammates with an energy barrier that simultaneously absorbs fire and boosts the power of her Particle Cannon.

hero.name: Zarya
hero.description: Deploying powerful personal barriers that convert incoming damage into energy for her massive Particle Cannon, Zarya is an invaluable asset on the front lines of any battle.

data.name: Energy
data.description: Damage blocked increases Particle Cannon damage.

hero.name: Zarya
hero.description: Deploying powerful personal barriers that convert incoming damage into energy for her massive Particle Cannon, Zarya is an invaluable asset on the front lines of any battle.

data.name: Graviton Surge
data.description: Zarya launches a gravity bomb that draws in enemy combatants and deals damage while they’re trapped.

hero.name: Zarya
hero.description: Deploying powerful personal barriers that convert incoming damage into energy for her massive Particle Cannon, Zarya is an invaluable asset on the front lines of any battle.
